name: Chocolate Pretzel Treats
author: LCDOYLE
summary: Quick and easy treat using three easy to find ingredients: Hershey's® Kisses, pretzels, and M&M's®.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package milk chocolate candy kisses (such as Hershey's Kisses®), unwrapped
1 (1.69 ounce) package candy-coated milk chocolate pieces (such as M&M's®)
directions: Preheat oven to 175 degrees F ( 80 degrees C)
Arrange pretzels on a baking sheet
Place a candy kiss on the center of each pretzel
Warm pretzels in the preheated oven until candy kiss is shiny and slightly softened, 2 minutes
Place a candy-coated chocolate piece atop the candy kiss on each pretzel; press down
Chill in the refrigerator for 10 minutes
